scenes.description: Opening montage for Takanashi Kiara's 4th Anniversary Live 'MIRAGE', featuring guest VTubers.
Red carpet interview with Ayunda Risu.
Red carpet interview with Moona Hoshinova.
Red carpet interview with Nerissa Ravencroft.
